titles.title: Community Economic Development Expertise Enhancement Act of 2007
To increase the expertise and capacity of community-based organizations involved in economic development activities and key community development programs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary: 12/6/2007--Introduced. Community Economic Development Expertise Enhancement Act of 2007 - Authorizes the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to make grants to increase the capacity and expertise of qualifying community-based economic development organizations. Directs the Secretary to: (1) conduct an assessment of such organizations' capability needs; and (2) establish the Advisory Council on Community Economic Development. Directs the President to include with each annual budget request a report regarding federal financial support for community economic development.
